items.title: Shriram Properties’ Q1 net profit rises 18% YoY, revenue up 24%
items.description: Shriram Properties Limited announced impressive first-quarter results. Net profit rose 18% to ₹20.6 crore. Total revenue reached ₹261.5 crore, a 24% increase. Revenue from operations jumped 57%. This growth was driven by successful project handovers. The company is expanding its project pipeline. They are evaluating multiple projects. CMD Murali M attributed the success to strong execution.

items.title: IndiQube Q1 profit surges 303%, revenue hits Rs 313 crore
items.description: IndiQube posted record ₹313 crore revenue in Q1 FY26, up 27% YoY, with 98% recurring revenue. EBITDA nearly doubled, net profit surged 303% IGAAP-equivalent, as operational footprint and sustainability initiatives expanded significantly.

items.title: Hindalco Q1 profit rises 30% as Novelis outlook brightens for H2
items.description: Hindalco’s Q1 profit rose 30% to ₹4,004 crore on higher revenue, while Novelis faced a 36% net income drop. Management expects scrap price improvements to boost Novelis in H2.

items.title: Karnataka Bank Q1 profit falls 27% on lower income, higher provisions
items.description: Karnataka Bank’s Q1 net profit fell 27% to ₹292.4 crore due to lower net interest income and higher provisions. Operating profit declined, while other income rose 28% but couldn’t offset core income fall.

items.title: Apollo Hospitals Q1 Results: Cons PAT surges 42% YoY to Rs 433 crore, revenue rises 15%
items.description: Apollo Hospitals reported a 42% YoY rise in consolidated PAT to ₹433 crore in Q1FY26, driven by 15% revenue growth across healthcare, diagnostics, and digital pharmacy segments. Sequential profit rose 11%, with board approving stake acquisition in AGPCL.

items.title: NSDL Q1 Results: Cons PAT jumps 15% YoY to Rs 90 crore despite 7% drop in revenue
items.description: National Securities Depository Limited (NSDL) on Tuesday reported a consolidated net profit of Rs 90 crore in Q1 which was up 15% YoY compared to Rs 78 crore reported in the year ago period.

items.title: Novelis Q1 Results: Net income slumps 36% to $96 million, sales sees 13% growth
items.description: Novelis Inc, the wholly-owned subsidiary of Hindalco Industries, has reported a 36% year-on-year fall in its net income for the June quarter at $96 million. Excluding special items, the bottomline was 43% lower compared to the previous year at $116 million.

items.title: RVNL Q1 Results: Cons PAT slumps 40% YoY; revenue, income see marginal dip
items.description: RVNL Q1 Results: Revenue from operations stood at ₹3,908.77 crore, marking a 4.05% YoY decline from ₹4,073.80 crore in Q1FY24. Total income dropped 4.61% YoY to ₹4,136.96 crore from ₹4,336.75 crore in the same quarter last year, reflecting weaker topline performance.

items.title: Suzlon Energy Q1 results: Cons PAT jumps 7% YoY to Rs 324 crore; revenue soars 55%
items.description: Suzlon Energy reported a 7% YoY rise in Q1FY26 net profit to Rs 324 crore, with revenue up 55% and record deliveries. Strong order growth, domestic demand, and export potential bolster its clean energy outlook.

items.title: Nykaa Q1 Results: Cons PAT soars 79% YoY to Rs 24 crore, revenue jumps 23%
items.description: Nykaa Q1 Results: FSN E-Commerce, which operates 'Nykaa' brand, reported a consolidated net profit of Rs 24 crore in Q1, which was up 79% compared to Rs 14 crore reported in the year ago period.

items.title: HAL Q1 results: Cons PAT slips 4% YoY to Rs 1,383 crore, revenue surges 11%
items.description: Hindustan Aeronautics Ltd reported a 3.7% YoY decline in consolidated Q1FY26 net profit to Rs 1,383.77 crore, despite an 10.8% surge in revenue to Rs 4,819.01 crore. Quarterly profits fell sharply 65.2% sequentially.

items.title: Hindalco Q1 Results: Cons PAT jumps 30% YoY to Rs 4,004 crore; revenue rises 13%
items.description: Hindalco Q1 Results: Revenue from operations for the quarter stood at Rs 64,232 crore, up 13% from Rs 57,013 crore in the corresponding quarter of the previous financial year.

items.title: MRF Q1 Results: Con PAT slides 12% YoY to Rs 500.5 cr, revenue jumps nearly 7%
items.description: MRF’s Q1FY26 net profit fell 13.35% YoY to ₹500.47 crore, while revenue from operations rose 6.65% to ₹7,675.69 crore. Total income grew 7.2% YoY, and profit dipped 2.3% sequentially.

items.title: Fusion Finance to bet on MSMEs, expects better show in Q3
items.description: The lender's assets under management (AUM) contracted 37% year-on-year to ₹7,688 crore at the end of June, from ₹12,193 crore a year ago, after it slowed loan disbursals to the overleveraged and defaulting bottom-of-the-pyramid borrowers.
